actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that the amount paid for physicians' services under a State plan for medical assistance under such title may not be less than the amount paid for such services under the medicare program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Medicaid Physician Payment Equity Act of 1991

summary.text: Medicaid Physician Payment Equity Act of 1991 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require that the amount paid for physician services under a State plan for medical assistance under Medicaid may not be less than the amount paid for such services under the Medicare (title XVIII of the Social Security Act) program.

titles.title: Medicaid Physician Payment Equity Act of 1991

To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that the amount paid for physicians' services under a State plan for medical assistance under such title may not be less than the amount paid for such services under the medicare program, and for other purposes.
